__e: I won't abandon Omar White. I won't.
Omar White should be allowed to be who he is... and I should be allowed to be who I am.
But then I thought about Omar White, about how hard it was to turn him around.
Boy by the name of Omar was in on it, too.
- Omar be dead. I'm tellin' you.

Omar has stolen my people's jewel.
You know, Omar told me what happened and why.
